Text.Name: Gong_3_Jin
Text.Desc: Legend has it that this is a secret Law from the demon realm for the realization of sword mastery. It leads its follower through seven states. Both the beginning and advancement in cultivation are relatively difficult. One will become very powerful in battles and have a strong intention to kill, which leads to the extremely dangerous triple thunders of tribulation. It is an absolute killer's Law.
Text.SelectDesc: One will excel in artifact mastery and become powerful in battles, but have to go through multiple Heavenly Tribulations due to all the killings. Are you sure you want to follow this Law?
Text.Stages.0.Necks.0.Desc:
Find one's own Seven-Slaughtering Sword with a whole-hearted determination. If it goes wrong, start it again from scratch. [color=#D06508]
This breakthrough can be completed after repeated attempts. 
This breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low perception. 
Failing to breakthrough may lead to injury.[/color]
Text.Stages.1.Necks.0.Desc:
Form the sword aura to split open the mind gate with determination, spending one's fine energy, blood and life energy. [color=#D06508]
This breakthrough can be completed after repeated attempts. 
This breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low perception. 
Failing to breakthrough may lead to injury.[/color]
Text.Stages.2.Desc: Condense the sword aura into the essence of the blade, like the Golden Core combined with mixed elements.
Text.Stages.3.Desc: The thunder of tribulation falls as the sword core comes into shape. Use it to form the will of the sword.
Text.Stages.4.Necks.0.Desc: After the heavenly tribulation, return to the purest form and create the sword embryo from the sword core.
Text.Stages.5.Necks.0.Desc: Use the sword will to steal the heavenly Law to destruction from the tribulations to reach the state of a heavenly swordsman. If successful, one shall face the anger from heaven—the ultimate heavenly tribulation.
Text.Stages.6.Necks.0.Desc: Use the heavenly thunder to forge the sword soul as proof of pure Yang to ascend toward immortality.
